Lucy Jumeyi Ogbadu (amụrụ ya na 25 Septemba na-afo 1953) bụ onye Naijiria microbiologist ma jee ozi dị ka Director General / CEO nke National Biotechnology Development Agency (NABDA), ụlọ ọrụ nyocha n'okpuru Ministry of Science & Technology nke Naijiria ruo mgbe ọ gwụchara n'afọ 2018.

Tupu ọ malite ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi nke NABDA na Nọvemba 2013, Ogbadu akụziwo na Alma mater ya Mahadum Ahmadu Bello di Na Zaria, ruo afọ iri abụọ ma mesịa na Benue State University, Makurdi, ruo afọ isii ọzọ. N'afọ 2002, a họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ onye nduzi nke nyocha na mmepe na NABDA ma mesịa bụrụ onye nduji nke Bioentrepreneurship site n'afọ 2004 ruo 2005
Ogbadu rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye isi nchịkwa / onye isi nke NABDA ọnwa atọ n'afọ 2005, ma mesịa bụrụ onye isi nke ngalaba nri na ụlọ ọrụ Biotechnology na NABDA site n'afọ 2005 ruo afo 2011
Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka onye nduzi nyocha site na 2011 ruo 2013, mgbe a họpụtara ya n'ọkwa ya ugbu a.
Ogbadu malitere mbufe teknụzụ na "Temporary Immersion Bioreactor System" site na AZUTECNIA nke Cuba gaa na Naịjirịa maka mmepụta buru ibu nke osisi ndị a ma ama

[nkọwa dị mkpa] Ọ kwadokwara ịbịanye aka na nkwekọrịta nghọta banyere mmepụta ọgwụ mgbochi n'etiti Finlay nke Cuba na Naịjirịa (FMST, Federal University of Technology, Minna na CDC jikọrọ aka) na 2013
[nkọwarị dị mkpa]
N'oge ọ na-eje ozi dị ka onye isi nchịkwa, Ogbadu weghachiri ndị otu Naịjirịa nke International Centre for Genetic Engineering and Biotechnology
A malitere ọrụ nkà na ụzụ ndị ọzọ site na mmekorita ya na Food and Agriculture Organization nke United Nations n'okpuru mmekorita South South n'oge a
[nkọwa dị mkpa]
Na mbido ọrịa Ebola virus nke West Africa na 2014, NABDA n'okpuru idu ndú ya mepụtara nyocha na primers maka ịchọpụta ọrịa Ebola virus
Ngwongwo ahụ nwere ike ịchọpụta n'ime awa 24 nke ịkpọtụrụ nje ahụ, ọbụna tupu mgbaàmà amalite igosipụta, si otú a gbochie mgbasa nke ọrịa ahụ
E nwetara nke a na mmekorita ya na ụlọ ọrụ biotechnology nke South Korea Bioneer.
N'okpuru afọ abụọ nke idu ndú ya dị ka Director General, ọ nwere ihe ịga nke ọma n'ịgba mbọ ka a gafee Biosafety Bill nke Naịjirịa, nke nọ na limbo kemgbe e bidoro ya na 2002, n'ime iwu
N'otu aka ahụ, Biotechnology Bill enwetala nkwado nke Federal Executive Council n'otu oge ahụ ma ugbu a n'ihu National Assembly
E mepụtara atụmatụ atụmatụ atụmatụ afọ ise nke biotechnology maka oge mbụ ma na- Ana emejuputa ya ugbu a.
Ogbadu ebipụtala ihe karịrị akwụkwọ / akwụkwọ 40 nke nchọpụta nchọpụta ya, pasent 87 nke dị na akwụkwọ akụkọ mba ụwa a ma ama na ndị ọzọ na akwụkwọ akụkọ / akwụkwọ dị elu
Ogbadu enyewo isi na Elsevier Encyclopedia of Food Microbiology
O gosipụtara  karịrị 22 Seminar na Conference Papers na nzukọ sayensị dị iche iche
